Posts.Content: Ktktbird360 wrote: I had a birad rating of 5 and benign biopsy. I'm waiting to get a second opinion from a cancer center. I wonder if what they found in the biopsy could have contributed to a false cancer prediction? Or does it look like they could have missed the mass? - BENIGN BREAST TISSUE WITH STROMAL FIBROSIS, FOCAL DUCT HYPERPLASIA AND COLUMNAR CELL CHANGE. Thanks in advance. Log in to post a reply

Posts.Content: Ktktbird360 wrote: I was given a birad a 5, then benign biopsy, then downshifted to a 4 and getting an mri on Monday. Do y'all know if the radial scar will show up on the mri? I know it fools radiologists on mammograms, I'm assuming it won't fool the mri tech? Also, I've read that radial scars don't cause skin retraction... But that's what started this whole thing. Do you guys know if those can be associated? I really like my new surgeon. She took time to answer my questions and was very personable. I'm so thankful to be in the 80% benign group instead of the 5%!!! Log in to post a reply
